properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 7:57PM CST until February 12 at 3:36AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Buttahatchie River...Little
Tallahatchie Canal...Tombigbee River...Yalobusha River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Yalobusha River at Calhoun City
* until Tuesday February 11.
* At 7 PM Monday the stage was 23.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 24.0 feet on Tuesday February 11.
* Flood stage is 23.0 feet.
* The river rose above flood stage Monday February 10 and will
continue rising to near 24.0 feet by Tuesday February 11.
* At 24.0 feet...Extensive agriculture flooding is occurring.
Access to low-lying areas restricted due to flood waters
covering secondary roads.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
